title: Concerning food allergies
context: Warn the server that you will get sick if you eat a certain ingredient.

content.bestLine: I'm allergic to nuts, can you ensure they're not in my meal?

neutral.text: I have a food allergy, can you help?
Does this dish contain any common allergens?
I need to avoid gluten, what options do you have?
Can you check if this meal contains soy?
I'm allergic to shellfish, is it in this dish?
Do you have any nut-free options?
I have a dairy allergy, what can I order?
Can you ask the chef about cross-contamination?

formal.text: I would like to inform you of a severe food allergy.
Could you please confirm the ingredients in this dish?
I require a meal that is free from gluten and nuts.
I would appreciate it if you could check with the chef about food allergies.
Do you have a protocol in place for handling food allergies?
I need to ensure that my meal is prepared in a dedicated area.

patterns.template: I am allergic to [options], can you accommodate me?
Can you ensure that my meal is free from [options]?

dialogs.description: Informing the server about a food allergy

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: I'm allergic to nuts, can you ensure they're not in my meal?

lines.speaker: Server
lines.text: Absolutely, let me check with the chef. We can prepare a nut-free option for you.

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Do you have a protocol in place for handling food allergies?

lines.speaker: Server
lines.text: Yes, we take food allergies very seriously. We have a dedicated area for preparing meals for customers with allergies.
